system.effect:
Chloroform’s for kidnappin’ people and calmin’ down folk who’re panickin’. Probably more for kidnappers, but I like to be positive sometimes, heh.

Chloroform forces anyone who breathes it to make a Stun save at a -2 or be knocked unconscious until they make the save. Using it usually requires a Brawling attack with a cloth soaked in chloroform. It can also be poured into a vessel. Each bottle contains 25 doses.
